channel.title: Teamview port forward?
channel.description:
>-> Yes I know portforwarding is simple. But for some reason I can't port forward my 317 rsps.. I've added exceptions to my Norton Firewall, I've added exceptions to my Firewall. I've port forwarded on my routers homepage. I've changed the ip in client.java and gui.java to my no-ip.
But it's just not working for my players.
so can someone teamview me or something <-<

o:

item.title: Teamview port forward?
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:

->
Yes I know portforwarding is simple.
But for some reason I can’t port forward my 317 rsps…
I’ve added exceptions to my Norton Firewall, I’ve added exceptions to my Firewall.
I’ve port forwarded on my routers homepage.
I’ve changed the ip in client.java and gui.java to my no-ip.

But it’s just not working for my players.

so can someone teamview me or something <-<
